Generation VIII.Sword: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It's also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.
Generation VIII.Shield: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Crown Shrine ( Only one , if the player obtained the Iceroot Carrot )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Scarle: Glaseado Mountain after receiving the Glastrier Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Solo Quest )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Violet: Glaseado Mountain after receiving the Glastrier Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Group Quest )
